languages.text: Создает огненный взрыв, который наносит {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}. Цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −30 и в случае провала получают {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text: Launches a fire blast dealing {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and inflicting {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

languages.text: 发射烈焰冲击波，造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，并使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。目标需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}才能消除燃烧状态，但此次检定会承受-30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text: ファイアブラストを発射し{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与え、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}にする。ターゲットは−30の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。

languages.text: Lanza una llamarada que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño de fuego{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} a menos que el objetivo supere una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −30.

languages.text: Entfacht einen Feuerstoß, der 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} verursacht, es sei denn, das Ziel besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −30.

Bu etki, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
